crl.help: Certificate Revocation List as a PEM file.
crl.name: crl

http-url.help: HTTP server URL for CRL auto-update.
http-url.name: http-url

ldap-server.help: LDAP server name for CRL auto-update.
ldap-server.name: ldap-server

range.help: Either global or VDOM IP address range for the certificate.
range.name: range

scep-cert.help: Local certificate for SCEP communication for CRL auto-update.
scep-cert.name: scep-cert

scep-url.help: SCEP server URL for CRL auto-update.
scep-url.name: scep-url

source-ip.help: Source IP address for communications to a HTTP or SCEP CA server.
source-ip.name: source-ip

update-interval.help: Time in seconds before the FortiGate checks for an updated CRL. Set to 0 to update only when it expires.
update-interval.name: update-interval

results.help: Certificate Revocation List as a PEM file.
results.name: crl
